sheet_title: Title 24 Energy Compliance (CF-1R Performance Method, Pages 1-6 of 11)
prepared_by: URO DESIGNS — P.O. Box 470011, Los Angeles, CA 90047
description: Composited CF-1R Certificate of Compliance (Residential Performance Compliance Method) containing pages 1 through 6 of 11. Includes energy use intensity summary, general project information, opaque surfaces, fenestration/glazing schedules, attic, compliance remarks, opaque doors, surface constructions, and energy use summary. Generated by CBECC-Res 2022.3.2 SP1 via CHEERS.
key_content: CF-1R Performance Compliance Method — pages 1-6 of 11
Building Type: Single Family, Newly Constructed Addition
Gross EUI: Standard 25.69 kBtu/ft²-yr, Proposed 25.22 kBtu/ft²-yr, Margin 0.47
Net EUI: Standard 25.69 kBtu/ft²-yr, Proposed 25.22 kBtu/ft²-yr, Margin 0.47
SHGC: 0.23 (NFRC source, Bug Screen exterior shading)
Wall construction: R-15 Wall Stucco, Wood Framed Wall, 2x4 @ 16 in. O.C.
Roof: R-0 Asphalt Shingle, Ventilated, 4:12 pitch
Opaque surfaces: Rear Wall (265 ft², azimuth 180), Right Wall (153 ft², azimuth 270), Left Wall (114 ft², azimuth 90), Front Wall (204 ft², azimuth 0)
Fenestration: Window E(1) Back 10 ft² U-0.4, Window A(1) Left 6 ft² U-0.3, Window B(1) Left 9 ft² U-0.3, Window B(1) Right 15 ft² U-0.3, Door 2 Right 80 ft² U-0.3
Opaque Door: Door 1 on Front Exterior Wall 1, 24 ft²
Efficiency Compliance Total TDV: Standard 70.82, Proposed 72.84
Required Special Feature: NEEA rated heat pump water heater (demand-response compatible)
HERS verification required: indoor air quality ventilation, kitchen range hood, heat pump rated heating capacity
Compliance Remark: Building Complies with Computer Performance
NOT SHOWN: PV solar system specs (pages 7-11 not on this sheet)
NOT SHOWN: HVAC system type and efficiency ratings (SEER2, HSPF2)
NOT SHOWN: Duct insulation R-value and sealing method

drawing_zones.content: CF-1R Page 1 of 11 — Energy Use Intensity summary table, Required Special Features, HERS Feature Summary, Zone Information
CF-1R Page 4 of 11 — General Information table (project name, climate zone 6, building type, floor area 475 ft², bedrooms, fuel type), Margin Percentage, Addition Alone parameters, ADU parameters
CF-1R Page 2 of 11 — Opaque Surfaces table (7 surfaces: 4 walls, ceiling, exterior floor, interior floor), Attic table (asphalt shingle ventilated), Fenestration/Glazing table (Window B(1))
CF-1R Page 5 of 11 — Compliance Remarks (building complies), Fenestration wall exceptions table, Radiant Barrier/Cool Roof, SHGC details (0.23 NFRC). CHEERS logo watermark
CF-1R Page 3 of 11 — Detailed Fenestration/Glazing schedule (Window E(1), A(1), B(1), Door 2), Opaque Doors (Door 1, 24 ft²), Opaque Surface Constructions (R-15 Wall Stucco, 2x4 @ 16 in. O.C.)

CF-1R Page 6 of 11 — Energy Use Summary table (Space Heating, Cooling, IAQ Ventilation, Water Heating, Photovoltaics, Lighting, Appliances, Plug Loads — Standard vs. Proposed TDV values, Total Compliance 212.83 vs 208.07)
